about_the_game:
LUCIDO Cancels Everything the psychedelic Beat 'Em Up spectacle from outer space!

At gizawave° we blend a free flowing Beat 'Em Up extravaganza with high quality late nineties aesthetics, far fetched conspiracies, rare fortune cookie wisdom and degenerate memes, a tiny little bit of s*x appeal and mix with twenty five thousand gallons of blood and two sprigs of rosemary. Add crushed ice, shake well and enjoy your psychosis m8!

FEATURES:

  • Vicious free-flowing combat that allows for creative combos
  • Destroy your enemies with lots of savage and brutal weapons
  • Classic arcade gameplay, hunting for the local highscore and ranks
  • Beautiful and hugely detailed 16-Bit Pixelart and tons of animations
  • Extensive atmospheric OST featuring Phonk, Trap & Vaporwave

Get the demo! Available now!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features scenes of non-explicit sexuality and intense pixelated violence. Viewer discretion is advised.

name: LUCIDO Cancels Everything Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core 3 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
